entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nipawin Airport 08:39 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -36.3°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
